data.message: Good Work. It's clean, the Header looks really pretty, hope to get it asap.

replies.message: Thanks for the compliment, Torsten. We'll pass it along to our team! - Leigh

Hi. Dear Facebook, I have a big problem. To me many foreign people send messages of 'Hi dear, how are you, what are you doing, I found your profile, I'd like to chat with you.When I open it, constantly writing 'this post is not available or it is considered offensive'. So I want to ask you,what can I do to stop it? It's so irritate. Thanks, anyway. I'd like to hear and see your answer. Your user,Mirjana.
Issuing new Facebook I do not see my friends on the other side of Facebook Developers
I do not know either, May be it could be something to the systom sat-up.
